titles.title: Lord You Are So Precious To Me

comments.comment:
verse 1 (alternate) verse 2 (alternate) ending (alternate)

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Lord You are so precious to me
Lord You are so precious to me
And I love You yes I love You
Because You first loved me

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Lord You are so gracious to me
Lord You are so gracious to me
And I love You yes I love You
Because You first loved me

verse.name: e1a
verse.lines:
And I love You yes I love You
Because You first loved me

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Lord You are so precious to us
Lord You are so precious to us
And we love You yes we love You
Because You first loved us

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Lord You are so gracious to us
Lord You are so gracious to us
And we love You yes we love You
Because You first loved us

verse.name: e1b
verse.lines:
And we love You yes we love You
Because You first loved us
